# Arcline - Professional Frontend Development Services

Arcline offers professional frontend development services built with modern technologies and AI-powered workflows. I create beautiful, responsive websites tailored to your specific needs.

## What is Arcline?

Arcline provides frontend development services specializing in tourism websites, e-commerce platforms, personal portfolios, business sites and more. Using AI-powered development with Cursor for fast initial builds, then manually refining every detail for production quality.

## Services Offered

- **Tourism Websites**: Engaging travel and hospitality platforms
- **E-commerce Platforms**: Online stores and shopping experiences  
- **Personal Portfolios**: Showcase your work beautifully
- **Business Websites**: Professional corporate presence
- **Landing Pages**: High-converting single page experiences
- **Admin Dashboards**: Powerful management interfaces
- **Custom Solutions**: Tailored to your specific requirements

## Tech Stack

- **Next.js 15**: Modern React framework with App Router
- **TypeScript**: Type-safe development
- **Tailwind CSS**: Utility-first styling
- **shadcn/ui**: Beautiful, accessible component library
- **Supabase**: Backend services and database
- **Cursor AI**: AI-powered development workflow
- **Framer Motion**: Smooth animations
- **Responsive Design**: Mobile-first approach

## Key Features

- **Custom Design Systems**: Built specifically for your brand using shadcn/ui
- **SEO Optimized**: Built-in best practices from day one
- **Performance Focused**: Fast loading and smooth interactions
- **Accessibility**: WCAG compliant interfaces
- **Production Ready**: Fully optimized and deployable
- **Modern UI/UX**: Clean, intuitive interfaces

## Development Process

Starting with AI-powered development using Cursor to build the initial structure quickly. Then manually refining every detail, optimizing for performance, ensuring responsive design across all devices, and making sure everything is production-ready with proper SEO, accessibility and best practices baked in.

## Why Choose Arcline?

Professional frontend development that balances speed with quality. AI-powered efficiency meets human craftsmanship. Each project gets custom attention, tailored solutions, and modern best practices built in from the start.

## Contact

- **Website**: https://arcline.dev
- **Email**: privacy@arcline.dev
- **Twitter**: @jackjack_eth
